title: RADS ERROR
body:
Hello,guys since 9/20/2016 i have a problem with the RADS ERROR.Is somebody there to help me to resolve this error?
Thanks,
JokerPlaysLOL1

replies.body: The RADS error is usually caused by a security or permissions issue blocking the game from loading.  For your specific issue, I suggest using the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide for the fix.  Let me know if you have any questions.
